name: glint3d
description: 3D graphics engine and viewer with WebGL2 and native desktop support

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:web
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/ops-sdk && npm run build --workspace=packages/wasm-bindings
scripts.dev:packages: npm run dev --workspace=packages/ops-sdk & npm run dev --workspace=packages/wasm-bindings
scripts.publish:packages: npm run build:packages && npm publish --workspace=packages/ops-sdk && npm publish --workspace=packages/wasm-bindings
